eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Beauregard, LA; AT 11:24 AM ON SEP 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:21 AM SEP 19, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: DeRidder City Police Depsrtment and BPSO are alerting residents to a dangerous situation. There has been a bomb threat made to the courthouse. All business and residents around this are being evacuated at this time and we are asking everyone to avoid this area until further notice. Evacuate and avoid the areas of downtown DeRidder near the courthouse.
